createProfile(bytes32,bytes32,uint32,str.details: emits a log with all the information added and can be disable with circuit breaker.

params._imageHash: hash of the profile pic of the user.

getProfiles().return: address[] the array of profile addresses.

giveDonation(address).details: emits a log with all the information added and can be disable with circuit breaker.

toggleContractActive().details: Can only be executed by admin and emits a log with the current value of the stopped.

updateProfile(bytes32,bytes32,uint32,str.details: emits a log with all the information added and can be disable with circuit breaker.

params._imageHash: hash of the profile pic of the user.

withdrawDonation(uint256).details: emits a log with all the information of the withdraw and can be disable with circuit breaker.

params._amount: value that represents how much to withdraw.

methods.constructor: Constructor sets the as the owner the deployer of the contract.

createProfile(bytes32,bytes32,uint32,str.notice: Creates a profile with user basic information.

getCurrentProfilesSize().notice: Gets the size of the profiles array.

getProfiles().notice: Gets the array of profiles addresses.

giveDonation(address).notice: Gives a donation to a user.

toggleContractActive().notice: Toogles the value of stopped in order to pause functionability of the contract.

updateProfile(bytes32,bytes32,uint32,str.notice: Updates the profile of a previously registered user.

withdrawDonation(uint256).notice: Withdraw the donatios of the user.
